text: <s>[INST] Clear caches for my site[/INST]{"tool": "AskForClarification", "parameters": {"question": "What is the name of your site and which environment should the caches be cleared for?", "original_request": "Clear caches for my site", "tool_intended": "ClearCaches"}}</s>

<s>[INST] Get SFTP credentials[/INST]{"tool": "AskForClarification", "parameters": {"question": "For which site and environment do you need the SFTP credentials?", "original_request": "Get SFTP credentials", "tool_intended": "SftpJson"}}</s>

<s>[INST] I need to clear cache[/INST]{"tool": "AskForClarification", "parameters": {"question": "Can you specify the site slug and the environment for which the cache needs to be cleared?", "original_request": "I need to clear cache", "tool_intended": "ClearCaches"}}</s>

<s>[INST] Fetch SFTP details[/INST]{"tool": "AskForClarification", "parameters": {"question": "Please provide the site slug and the environment you're requesting SFTP details for.", "original_request": "Fetch SFTP details", "tool_intended": "SftpJson"}}</s>

<s>[INST] Clear site cache[/INST]{"tool": "AskForClarification", "parameters": {"question": "What is the specific site and environment for the cache clearing request?", "original_request": "Clear site cache", "tool_intended": "ClearCaches"}}</s>

<s>[INST] SFTP credentials, please[/INST]{"tool": "AskForClarification", "parameters": {"question": "Could you specify the site and environment for which you need the SFTP credentials?", "original_request": "SFTP credentials, please", "tool_intended": "SftpJson"}}</s>
